Shades of Purple Theme for Hyper‚Ñ¢

[![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-hyper.svg?style=social&label=Stars)](https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-hyper/stargazers) [![GitHub followers](https://img.shields.io/github/followers/ahmadawais.svg?style=social&label=Follow)](https://github.com/ahmadawais?tab=followers) [![Tweet for help](https://img.shields.io/twitter/follow/mrahmadawais.svg?style=social&label=Tweet%20@MrAhmadAwais)](https://twitter.com/mrahmadawais/)
Shades-of-Purple Theme for Hyper‚Ñ¢
I üíú purple, because purple can be genius.
A FOSS (Free & Open Source Software) project. Maintained by @AhmadAwais.

> Professional Hyper‚Ñ¢ Terminal theme with hand-picked & bold shades of purple üíú to go along with your command line usage. A custom Hyper‚Ñ¢ Terminal theme with style.
![Install](https://on.ahmda.ws/qWVC/c) ## Easy Installation Make sure you have the latest Hyper‚Ñ¢ Terminal installed i.e. >= ver 2.0. Which comes with the Hyper CLI. Then just run the following command. ```sh hyper i shades-of-purple-hyper ``` ## Manual Installation 1. Go to Hyper‚Ñ¢ preferences i.e. Open your `~/.hyper.js` config file. On mac press Command ‚åò + , ‚Äî or just use your code editor like `code ~/.hyper.js` or `subl ~/.hyper.js` or `vim ~/.hyper.js`. 2. Add `shades-of-purple-hyper` to your plugins array. Kindov like this: ```js plugins: [ 'shades-of-purple-hyper' ], ``` ‚Äî Done!!! üôå
![Shades of purple for other software](https://on.ahmda.ws/qYAe/c) ## Put `Shades of Purple` In Other Places! I have built other `Shades of Purple` themes for different software. Here's a list. - üíú [VSCode theme](https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-vscode) ‚Äî Shades of Purple - üíú [iTerm2 theme](https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-iterm2) ‚Äî Shades of Purple - üíú [Hyper‚Ñ¢ theme](https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-hyper) ‚Äî Shades of Purple - üíú [Konsole theme](https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-konsole) ‚Äî Shades of Purple - üíú [Slack theme](https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-slack) ‚Äî Shades of Purple - üíú [Alfred theme](https://github.com/ahmadawais/shades-of-purple-alfred) ‚Äî Shades of Purple
